page.title: 10Recreation- Playground Games
page.content: I like to play Â£Hot Potato or Fireball'. You need a ball & at least four people to play. You all stand in a circle facing the centre. You have to throw the ball to the next person as soon as you catch it, because it is supposed to be hot. You carry on throwing the ball round the circle until someone drops it. They have to run around the circle while the next person gets the ball. When that person has got the ball they throw it to the next person as fast as they can. When the ball gets to the person next to the one that dropped the ball, they stump the place & that person has to sit in the middle of the circle. If that person is already in his place the game just carries on. It is best to play this game in an open space.
